title: Rahul was having his snacks at a roadside dhaba, not at a Martyr’s home
subtitle: Rahul ate the snacks at a roadside dhaba in U.P. and not at the Martyr’s home.
author: factly.in
vclaim:
Many Facebook users are sharing a post with the picture of Rahul Gandhi, Priyanka Gandhi and a child. In the post, it is alleged that, when Rahul visited a Martyr’s home, he ate the snacks of the child. Let’s try to analyze the claims made in the post.

When the image in the post is run through Google Reverse Image search with filters, then a YouTube video of ‘The Quint’ with the title “Priyanka Gandhi & Rahul Gandhi went to a dhaba in Kairana on their way to meet the family of a CRPF trooper” was found. In the video, it can found that Rahul and Priyanka on their way to meet the family of a CRPF Jawan, halted at a roadside dhaba “Shiv Shakti” in Shamli district of U.P. for a cup of tea. In the video, Rahul and Priyanka duo were seen interacting with fellow customers in the dhaba and eating the snacks which were put on their table.

To sum it up, Rahul ate the snacks at a roadside dhaba in U.P. and not at the Martyr’s home.
